member.name: M:AppForSkills.Api.Controllers.PostsController.GetPhotoOrVideo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get photo or video of user skill.
member.returns: Photo or video with skill, which user wants to share.

member.name: M:AppForSkills.Api.Controllers.PostsController.GetDescriptionAboutUserPost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get description about photo or video, which has been posted by user.
member.param: Id of post, which description we want to get.
